CustomField.description: If checked, Rollup will automatically reparent children records when a parent record is merged. If you have pre-existing merge handling, please uncheck this option!
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, Rollup will automatically reparent children records when a parent record is merged. If you have pre-existing merge handling, please uncheck this option!
CustomField.label: Is Merge Reparenting Enabled
